title: Screen Translator 1.2.3 + Portable [Eng-Rus] - AppzDam
description:
For more info visit : appzdam.net

The screen interpreter. Allows you to translate text on images, the software interface elements, sites with copy protection, first recognizes text (the system Tesseract), and then takes it (online service Google). Just select the area with the text and the application will automatically recognize it and translate one of the 58 languages. Depending on the settings transfer occurs in the system tray or by the allocation of plots.
